item.description:
Kickoff the holiday season at the First Annual "Holiday Hoedown", with all your country music & dance friends, at the Vittori-Rocci Post, 143 Brimbal Ave in Beverly MA

Midnight Rodeo Bar, Lead Singer of "Crisis", Fred Ellsworth and DJ Fred Rapoport are teaming up to present the first annual "Holiday Hoedown" ...

Come on over and kickoff the holiday season with 300 of your County Music and Dance friends on Thanksgiving Weekend at t...he Vittori Rocci ITAM Club, 143 Brimbal Ave in Beverly MA on Thanksgiving weekend ... Friday, Nov 26th ...

Line Dance Instructor Michelle Jackson will be teaching a seperate admission two hour line dance workshop from 4-6:30PM ... tickets cost $15 in advance and $20 at the door for the workshop only

Doors open for the party at 7PM ... tickets cost $15 in advance and $20 at the door for the party only or $25 (in advance) for both the party and the workshop

We're gonna have a "pot luck" so bring your Thanksgiving left overs

New Englands top country band, Crisis will be performing and veteran DJ Fred Rapoport will by spinning tunes and country music videos for your line, partner and lead & follow country dancing ...

PayPal accepted ... type in fredrapoport@comcast.net as the recipient or call (508) 596-7340 to send in a check

Free Food ... Good Friends ... Great Music ... Happy Holidays !!!!
item.name: Greater Boston/NH Holiday Hoedown
